author: Aisha Al-Muslim
title: Broadcom Board Approves $12 Billion Stock Buyback Plan
text:
Broadcom Ltd.’s board authorized buying back up to $12 billion in shares over the next 18 months, a move that comes after its deal to take over Qualcomm Inc. fell apart.
The move Thursday detailing plans for some of its cash sent shares up more than 4% to $249.70 in after-hours trading.
